channel.title: Combat
channel.description: In my server, the wildy levels don't really work. What i mean is that peope can attack each other, no matter their combat level. Also, players can team on NPC's even if the area is single. Please help if you can! Thanks.

item.title: Combat
item.dc:creator: @hitman2009 hitman2009
item.description:
@hitman2009 wrote:

[quote=“jamessemple, post:2, topic:305667”][quote author=hitman2009 link=topic=401893.msg2978607#msg2978607 date=1254450577]
In my server, the wildy levels don’t really work. What i mean is that peope can attack each other, no matter their combat level. Also, players can team on NPC’s even if the area is single. Please help if you can! Thanks.
[/quote]
Ok according to your description i’m guessing you’re using dodian/devolution source correct?
i need to know this because the simple terms for client.java vary from server to server[/quote]
Delta[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 03, 2009, 10:35:30 pm[/size][hr]Anyone?

Read full topic

item.title: Combat
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

hitman2009:

In my server, the wildy levels don’t really work. What i mean is that peope can attack each other, no matter their combat level. Also, players can team on NPC’s even if the area is single. Please help if you can! Thanks.

Ok according to your description i’m guessing you’re using dodian/devolution source correct?
i need to know this because the simple terms for client.java vary from server to server
